data.chText: 滑稽的长篇独白 / 故事

data.enText: The play is both comic and tragic.

data.chText: 在沉闷的聚会上，她总是能搞些笑料调剂气氛。
data.enText: She can always be relied on to provide comic relief (= sth to make you laugh) at a boring party.
connected with comedy (= entertainment that is funny and that makes people laugh)
an entertainer who makes people laugh by telling jokes or funny stories
a magazine, especially for children, that tells stories through pictures
the section of a newspaper that contains comic strips

data.text: funny ♦ amusing ♦ entertaining ♦ witty ♦ humorous ♦ comic ♦ hilarious

data.chText: 以上各词均用以形容人或事好笑的、滑稽的。
data.enText: These words all describe sb/sth that makes you laugh or smile.
He was a very funny guy.

data.chText: 指逗人笑的、有乐趣的、好笑的：
这种游戏玩起来非常有趣。
data.enText: It's a very amusing game to play.

data.chText: 指有趣的、令人开心的、使人愉快的：
那是一场非常令人开心的晚会。
data.enText: It was a very entertaining evening.

data.chText: 指机智的、巧妙的、妙趣横生的、言辞诙谐的：
data.enText: clever and amusing; able to say or write clever and amusing things

data.chText: 语言幽默的公共集会演讲人
指滑稽有趣的、有幽默感的：
data.enText: funny and entertaining; showing a sense of humour
a humorous look at the world of fashion

data.chText: 这本书里的许多情节都非常滑稽可笑。
data.enText: Many of the scenes in the book are richly comic.

data.chText: amusing在这组词中最通用，既表示逗人笑，也表示好笑、有乐趣，可用以形容事情、活动和场合：
data.enText: Amusing is the most general of these words because it includes the idea of being enjoyable as well as making people laugh and can be used to describe events, activities and occasions.

data.chText: 充满乐趣的联欢会 / 游戏 / 晚会
humorous语气不如funny或comic强，主要表示明白情景中的滑稽之处，而非实际使人大笑。comic尤指作品、戏剧、事物等故意营造的戏剧性的滑稽可笑，但不用以描述人（喜剧作家除外）。funny可形容人、笑话、故事、发生的事情以及任何使人发笑的事物。
data.enText: Humorous is not quite as strong as funny or comic and is more about showing that you see the humour in a situation, than actually making people laugh out loud. Comic is used to talk especially about writing and drama or things that are funny in a deliberate and theatrical way. It is not used to describe people (except for comic writers ). Funny can describe people, jokes and stories, things that happen, or anything that makes people laugh.

simple_means.memory_skill: com 宴会 + ic …的 → 宴会上大家嬉笑 → 使人发笑的

ex.chText: 该剧的滑稽场面太夸张了。
ex.enText: The comic scenes in the play were overdone.

ex.chText: 他的笑话给紧张的场面增添了些许轻松的气氛。
ex.enText: His jokes provided some comic relief from the intensity of the scene.

ex.chText: 他是名非常出色的喜剧演员。
ex.enText: He is a great comic actor.

synonyms.bx: 指有趣而引人发笑的；也指与喜剧有关的。

ex.chText: 你穿着你老婆的裤子看起来真好笑。
ex.enText: You look absurd/ridiculous in your wife's trousers.

ex.chText: 认为地球环绕月球运转的观点很可笑。
ex.enText: It's absurd/ridiculous to believe that the earth goes round the moon.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，指与常理或正常思维相悖而显得荒谬可笑的，常可与 ridiculous 换用。

ex.chText: 他讲起故事来言谈风趣。
我不明白你为什么觉得这个笑话如此好笑。
ex.enText: I fail to see why you find the joke so amusing.

ex.chText: 这是一部特别有趣的电影。
ex.enText: It is a highly amusing film.

synonyms.bx: 指故事、笑话、电影等有趣而惹人发笑的。

tr: a professional performer who tells jokes and performs comical acts

example: an amusing film with a steady stream of pranks and pratfalls
funny stories that made everybody laugh
it would have been laughable if it hadn't hurt so much

tr: of or relating to or characteristic of comedy

value.def: If you describe something as comic, you mean that it makes you laugh, and is often intended to make you laugh.

example.ex: The novel is comic and tragic...
example.tran: 这部小说令人笑中带泪。

example.ex: Most of these trips had exciting or comic moments.
example.tran: 大部分旅行途中都有激动人心或逗人开怀的时刻。

value.def: Comic is used to describe comedy as a form of entertainment, and the actors and entertainers who perform it.

example.ex: Grodin is a fine comic actor.
example.tran: 格罗丁是一位优秀的喜剧演员。

value.def: A comic is an entertainer who tells jokes in order to make people laugh.
A comic is a magazine that contains stories told in pictures.

example.tran: 乔喜欢看《超人》的漫画书。

value.boxr_value: in AM, usually use 美国英语通常用 comic book

value.def: The comics is the part of a newspaper that contains the comic strips.

trans: 暴走漫画；暴走漫画动画系列
喜歌剧；喜歌劇；喜剧歌剧院
喜剧救助组织；喜剧救济基金会；喜剧救助；喜剧救济；喜剧慈善
(常登载于报纸上的)连环漫画

partsOfSpeech.dec: com 睡 + a → 昏迷，昏睡
comat〔= com〕睡 + ose 有…性质的 → 昏睡的
com 宴会 + edy → 像宴会一样热闹 → 喜剧
com 宴会 + est + ible 可…的，能…的；具有…性质的 → 宴会上吃的东西 → 食品
com 宴会 + fy 使… → 举办宴会 → 大家心情轻松 → 轻松的
com 宴会 + ic …的 → 宴会上大家嬉笑 → 使人发笑的
com 宴会 + ity 具备某种性质，状况 → 宴会上大家相互敬酒 → 礼让
